name: Gloop Platformer
description:
Gloop platformer is a platformer game made using Unity. I drew everything apart from the cheese, bosses, mini-anubis', terrain and background. None of the music was created by me, and all the credits are below. Please feel free to tell me any suggestions or bugs that you find.

Credits:
- B.G.M (Music levels 1-9)
- Fred Patry (Other music)
- VGcomposer (Boss music)
- Elthen (Mini anubis)
- Aekero (Parts of tileset)
- isticker2016 (Cheese)
